title.full: The Wizards Who Fell In A Hole
title.reduced: The Wizards Who Fell In A Hole

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take a journey you’ll never forget into the clay-animated world of two of the most careless wizards on this (or any other) planet. Can you conquer 100 deviously dangerous levels to escape that infamous hole? You’ll have to defeat scores of unspeakably horrible monsters (and 10 perilous bosses) using only magic wands, a generous number of credits, and the irreplaceable art of amusing conversation.
